arts.ttl: Sevilla boss García Pimienta speaks ahead of his first Gran Derbi: ‘We have to make them proud…’
arts.sum: Sevilla manager García Pimienta is soon set to face his first big milestone at the helm of the Andalucia outfit- El Gran Derbi. The club take on their city rivals…
Barcelona were stunned by Osasuna last weekend but the Catalans can leave that behind in their trip to Alaves on Sunday as Joe Champions predicts the outcome in all 10 LaLiga matches this weekend.
